sentences.en: And whether they play in smoky cellar clubs or spacious concert hall, jazz musicians are drawing record crowds.
sentences.cn: 爵士音乐家们不论是在烟雾弥漫的地下室的俱乐部演奏,还是在豪华宽敞的音乐厅里表演, 都能吸引空前多的听众.

sentences.en: He then dismembered her, hiding parts of her body in the cellar.
sentences.cn: 他接着将她肢解，将部分尸体藏在了地窖里。

sentences.en: He took a bottle of wine from the cellar.
sentences.cn: 他从酒窖里拿出一瓶酒.

sentences.en: Jack dug his sled out of the cellar.
sentences.cn: 杰克从地窖中翻找出雪橇.

sentences.en: My words were lost as the walls above us crashed down, filling the cellar with brick dust.
sentences.cn: 我们头顶的墙塌了下来，地下室里满是砖灰，我惊得说不出话来。

sentences.en: The cellar was flooded with water.
The cellar was soon cleared out.
the inky blackness of the cellar
The little girl hid away in the cellar.
The noise fetched him from the cellar.
sentences.cn: 喧闹声使他从地下室跑了出来.

sentences.en: The period of maturation is determined by the cellar master.
sentences.cn: 酿熟期的长短由地窖的主人决定。

sentences.en: They had mysteriously found their way there from the wine cellar!
sentences.cn: 这些酒瓶神不知鬼不觉地从酒窖来到了这里.

sentences.en: Things are cooler and more damp as we descend to the cellar.
sentences.cn: 当我们往下走去地窖时，四周愈见阴冷潮湿。

sentences.en: When Tom's companions drank to the Hans en Kelderr, or Jack in the low cellar , he could not help displaying an extraordinary complacence of countenance.
sentences.cn: 当同事们举杯向他祝贺那未出世的孩子时, 汤姆不禁露出一种异常得意的神情.

words.tran_cn: 地窖；地窖容积；地窖贮藏费

phrases.tran_cn: 酒窖；酒的贮藏室；酒窖中的酒

trans.tran_en: a room under a house or other building, often used for storing things
